content: PageRank Decoder Tool from Search-This Search Engines By: Rand Fishkin June 16, 2005 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin June 16, 2005 PageRank Decoder Tool from Search-This Search Engines The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Mark, over at Search-This.com e-mailed me today about a great new Flash-based tool called the PageRank Decoder that SEOs can use to determine the impact of particular links between pages on their respective PageRanks. It's fun, visual and informative - even though PageRank is a largely useless measurement for rankings. I'm looking forward to seeing more from his site and his development work - he's got a great site and if the PageRank decoder is any indication, a very savvy idea of how to build great content for links. Copied! Back to Top
